SEARCH
Package feedbackpkg

Class FeedbackManager

java.lang.Object
feedbackpkg.FeedbackManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
iFeedbackCC, iFeedbackStaff, iFeedbackStudent, Serializable
public class FeedbackManager extends Object implements Serializable, iFeedbackCC, iFeedbackStaff
The FeedbackManager class manages the list of feedbacks in the system. It implements the Serializable interface for serialization and deserialization of the feedback list, and the iFeedbackCC and iFeedbackStaff interfaces for feedback operations.
See Also:

      public void addFeedback(Feedback feedback)

    • writeSerialisedObj

      public void writeSerialisedObj()
      Writes the current state of the feedback list to a file. The feedback list is serialized and written to a file with the name specified by the 'filename' field. If the operation is successful, it prints "Object Persisted" to the console. If an IOException occurs during the operation, it prints the stack trace to the error output stream.

    • readSerializedObject

      public ArrayList<Feedback> readSerializedObject()
      Reads the serialized feedback list from a file. The feedback list is deserialized from a file with the name specified by the 'filename' field. If the operation is successful, it returns the deserialized feedback list. If an IOException or ClassNotFoundException occurs during the operation, it prints the stack trace to the error output stream and returns null.
      Returns:
      the deserialized feedback list

    • getEnquiries

      public ArrayList<String> getEnquiries(String studentID)
      Retrieves a list of enquiries made by a specific student. This method iterates over the feedback list, and for each feedback that is an instance of Enquiry that was made by the specified student, it checks if the enquiry has been replied to. If the enquiry has not been replied to, it is added to the list of enquiries to return. If no enquiries are found for the specified student, an exception is thrown.
      Specified by:
      getEnquiries in interface iFeedbackStudent
      Parameters:
      studentID - the ID(Name) of the student whose enquiries are to be retrieved
      Returns:
      a list of string representations of the enquiries made by the specified student

    • submitEnquiry

      public void submitEnquiry(String studentID, String campID, String content)
      Submits a new enquiry for a specific camp. This method creates a new Enquiry object with the specified user ID, camp ID, and content. The new Enquiry object is added to the feedback list.
      Specified by:
      submitEnquiry in interface iFeedbackStudent
      Parameters:
      studentID - the ID(Name) of the student submitting the enquiry
      campID - the ID(Name) of the camp that the enquiry is for
      content - the content of the enquiry

    • editEnquiry

      public void editEnquiry(int feedbackID, String studentID, String newContent) throws Exception
      Edits an enquiry made by a specific student. This method iterates over the feedback list, and for each feedback that is an instance of Enquiry that was made by the specified student, it checks if the enquiry has been replied to. If the enquiry has not been replied to, its content is updated with the specified new content. If no enquiries are found for the specified student, or if the specified enquiry has already been replied to, an exception is thrown.
      Specified by:
      editEnquiry in interface iFeedbackStudent
      Parameters:
      feedbackID - the ID of the enquiry to be edited
      studentID - the ID(Name) of the student who made the enquiry
      newContent - the new content of the enquiry
      Throws:
      Exception - if no enquiries are found for the specified student, or if the specified enquiry has already been replied to

    • deleteEnquiry

      public void deleteEnquiry(int feedbackID, String studentID)
      Deletes an enquiry made by a specific student. This method iterates over the feedback list, and for each feedback that is an instance of Enquiry that was made by the specified student, it checks if the enquiry has been replied to. If the enquiry has not been replied to, it is removed from the feedback list. If no enquiries are found for the specified student, or if the specified enquiry has already been replied to, an exception is thrown.
      Specified by:
      deleteEnquiry in interface iFeedbackStudent
      Parameters:
      feedbackID - the ID of the enquiry to be deleted
      studentID - the ID(Name) of the student who made the enquiry
      Throws:
      Exception - if no enquiries are found for the specified student, or if the specified enquiry has already been replied to

    • getCampEnquiries

      public ArrayList<String> getCampEnquiries(ArrayList<String> regCampList)
      Retrieves a list of enquiries made to a specific camp. This method iterates over the feedback list, and for each feedback that is an instance of Enquiry that is associated with the specified camp, it checks if the enquiry has been replied to. If the enquiry has not been replied to, it is added to the list of enquiries to return. If no enquiries are found for the specified camp, an exception is thrown.
      Specified by:
      getCampEnquiries in interface iFeedbackCC
      Specified by:
      getCampEnquiries in interface iFeedbackStaff
      Parameters:
      regCampList - A list of camp IDs that the user is registered for.
      Returns:
      a list of string representations of the enquiries made to the specified camp
      Throws:
      Exception - if no enquiries are found for the specified camp

    • replyEnquiry

      public void replyEnquiry(int feedbackID, ArrayList<String> regCampList, String replyContent) throws Exception
      Replies to an enquiry made to a specific camp. This method iterates over the feedback list, and for each feedback that is an instance of Enquiry that is associated with the specified camp, it checks if the enquiry has been replied to. If the enquiry has not been replied to, it is updated with the specified reply content. If no enquiries are found for the specified camp, or if the specified enquiry has already been replied to, an exception is thrown.
      Specified by:
      replyEnquiry in interface iFeedbackCC
      Specified by:
      replyEnquiry in interface iFeedbackStaff
      Parameters:
      feedbackID - the ID of the enquiry to be replied to
      regCampList - A list of camp IDs that the user is registered for.
      replyContent - the reply content
      Throws:
      Exception - if no enquiries are found for the specified camp, or if the specified enquiry has already been replied to

    • getSuggestions

      public ArrayList<String> getSuggestions(String CampCommID)
      Retrieves a list of unapproved suggestions made by a specific user. This method iterates over the feedback list and checks if the feedback is a suggestion made by the user specified by CampCommID. If the suggestion is not approved, it is added to the SuggestionList. If no suggestions are found, a NullPointerException is thrown.
      Specified by:
      getSuggestions in interface iFeedbackCC
      Parameters:
      CampCommID - The ID of the user whose suggestions are to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      An ArrayList of unapproved suggestions from the specified user in String format.
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - If no suggestions are found for the specified user.

    • editSuggestion

      public void editSuggestion(int feedbackID, String CampCommID, String newContent)
      Edits the content of an unapproved suggestion made by a specific user. This method iterates over the feedback list and checks if the feedback is a suggestion made by the user specified by CampCommID and has the specified feedbackID. If the suggestion is not approved, its content is updated with newContent, the file is updated, and the method ends. If no matching unapproved suggestion is found, a NullPointerException is thrown.
      Specified by:
      editSuggestion in interface iFeedbackCC
      Parameters:
      feedbackID - The ID of the feedback to be edited.
      CampCommID - The ID(Name) of the user who made the suggestion.
      newContent - The new content for the suggestion.
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - If no matching unapproved suggestion is found.

    • deleteSuggestion

      public void deleteSuggestion(int feedbackID, String CampCommID)
      Deletes an unapproved suggestion made by a specific user. This method iterates over the feedback list and checks if the feedback is a suggestion made by the user specified by CampCommID and has the specified feedbackID. If the suggestion is not approved, it is removed from the feedback list, the file is updated, and the method ends. If no matching unapproved suggestion is found, a NullPointerException is thrown.
      Specified by:
      deleteSuggestion in interface iFeedbackCC
      Parameters:
      feedbackID - The ID of the feedback to be deleted.
      CampCommID - The ID(Name) of the user who made the suggestion.
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - If no matching unapproved suggestion is found.

    • submitSuggestion

      public void submitSuggestion(String CampCommID, String campID, String content)
      Submits a new suggestion for a specific camp. This method creates a new Suggestion object with the specified user ID, camp ID, and content. The new Suggestion object is added to the feedback list.
      Specified by:
      submitSuggestion in interface iFeedbackCC
      Parameters:
      CampCommID - The ID of the user submitting the suggestion.
      campID - The ID of the camp that the suggestion is for.
      content - The content of the suggestion.

    • getCampSuggestions

      public ArrayList<String> getCampSuggestions(String campID)
      Retrieves a list of suggestions made to a specific camp. This method iterates over the feedback list and checks if the feedback is a suggestion made to the specified camp. If the suggestion is approved, it is added to the CampSuggestionsList. If no suggestions are found for the specified camp, a NullPointerException is thrown.
      Specified by:
      getCampSuggestions in interface iFeedbackStaff
      Parameters:
      campID - The ID(Name) of the camp whose suggestions are to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      An ArrayList of approved suggestions made to the specified camp in String format.
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - If no suggestions are found for the specified camp.

    • approveSuggestion

      public void approveSuggestion(int feedbackID)
      Approves a suggestion made to a specific camp. This method iterates over the feedback list and checks if the feedback is a suggestion made to the specified camp. If the suggestion is not approved, it is updated to approved, the file is updated, and the method ends. If no matching suggestion is found, a NullPointerException is thrown.
      Specified by:
      approveSuggestion in interface iFeedbackStaff
      Parameters:
      feedbackID - The ID of the feedback to be approved.
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - If no matching suggestion is found.
